Articles.Content:
How does one become a featured streamer? I have been perfecting my modded KSP since .24 and am nearly ready to start my KSP stream back up, so I was just wondering what it takes to get up into that section on the forums.

Thank you in advance!

Hi WololoW,

The featured streamers are the one that also stream on KSP-TV - If you're interested in becoming a streamer there too, send a private message to Maxmaps, Yargnit or Rowsdower I'll see if I can catch one of your streams too, sounds interesting.

Thanks Kasper! I hope to get a schedule set for streaming so that people have a reliable time to catch me. It will likely be a late show (10:30pm MTN and later) but will include my modded KSP endeavors and my stock fun times.

The link to my stream is www.twitch.tv/wololow - Feel free to follow it to catch the forthcoming fun!

If you get a schedule you can post your stream up on the calendar! It's not quite as prominent as the featured streamers block, but a list of all upcoming livestreams that are entered there is shown at the bottom of the forum

I will totally utilize that - Small question though. Do I have to do anything special to make my stream appear embedded into that calendar link? I have not attempted to set my stream up in the calendar yet, so there may be a step I am missing.

yes, you use the [noparse]

[/noparse] bbcode
